snippet: With the future of the Federal Reserve’s bond-buying program uncertain, investors continued to take profits, and stocks slid for a second day.
abstract: Stock market slides for second day after pair of Federal Reserve officials made comments that left investors uncertain about timing of possible reduction in central bank's economic stimulus program.
lead_paragraph: With the future of the Federal Reserve’s bond-buying program uncertain, investors continued to take profits, and stocks slid for a second day.

headline.main: Anxiety About Fed Further Deflates Market
headline.print_headline: Anxiety About Fed Further Deflates Market
